definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)
to make a public display of affection

sentences.english: But the Queen Mother of ruthless, and finally he just break up this pair of happy couples.
sentences.chinese: 然而王母冷酷無情，最後硬是拆散了這對恩愛夫妻。

sentences.english: And thou shalt find grace and good understanding before God and men.
sentences.chinese: 這樣，你在天主和世人面前，必獲得寵幸和恩愛。

sentences.english: Wish the couple be a real old Darly and Joan…
sentences.chinese: 祝願他們倆成爲一對白頭偕老的恩愛夫妻。

sentences.english: However, Chapter conceal the appearance of loving feelings of emptiness and desolation of ice.
sentences.chinese: 然而恩愛的表象掩不住章冰的情感空虛和落寞。

sentences.english: Nicolas and Carla are very much in love. They want a child.
sentences.chinese: 尼古拉斯和卡拉非常恩愛，還想要個孩子。

sentences.english: The world of love, whether the dream without a trace?
sentences.chinese: 人間的恩愛，是否真如春夢了無痕？

sentences.english: Had thought them Daphnis and Chloe but they got divorced.
sentences.chinese: 人人都認爲他們是恩愛夫妻，但他們卻離婚了。

sentences.english: It was evidently a united and affectionate family.
sentences.chinese: 這顯然是和睦恩愛的一家人。

sentences.english: I am is, sister-in-law's couple was all also affectionate, forgot this gift sons.
sentences.chinese: 我當是，弟妹兩口子太過恩愛，把這禮兒都忘了。

sentences.english: "the best love song are written with a broken heart"…
sentences.chinese: 傷心最是月圓夜，萬般恩愛終成空。

sentences.english: Look at these birds, do you know they fall in love with each other at first sight.
sentences.chinese: 你看那鴻雁飛過聲聲鳴，卿可知此鳥乃是恩愛禽。

sentences.english: It is basic assurance to have a happy life of family.
sentences.chinese: 家庭和睦，夫妻恩愛，子女孝順是康復的基本保障。

sentences.english: They are devoted husband and wife.
They are Philemon and Baucis, a happy couple.
sentences.chinese: 他們是一對快樂恩愛的夫妻。

sentences.english: Fern loved Wilbur more than anything.
sentences.chinese: 弗恩愛威爾伯盛過一切。

definition: (coll.) (of a couple) to display affection in public or by posting photos on social media
(of a couple) to be harmonious/to be each other's sunshine
to issue a document/document issued by an authority/outgoing messages/(Internet) to post an article online
